sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
paralyses someone
, zaradi tistega nekdo ne čuti ničesar in se ne more premakniti.

seg.quote: A stroke paralysed half his face.
...a person paralysed from the neck down.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje, prostori ali ustanove
are paralysed by something
, zaradi nečesa ne morejo ustrezno ukrepati ali delovati.

seg.quote: Great cities are paralysed by strikes and power failures.
